name: agent-solution-bi
description: AgentBI - Sistema completo de Business Intelligence com IA

scripts.clean: npm run clean:processes && npm run clean:cache
scripts.clean:processes: taskkill /F /IM python.exe 2>nul || exit 0 && taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>nul || exit 0
scripts.clean:cache: cd backend && for /d /r %%d in (__pycache__) do @if exist "%%d" rd /s /q "%%d" 2>nul && del /s /q *.pyc 2>nul >nul || exit 0
